verses.roman:
tabe ye ca-kāra, sei 'samuccaya' kaya
"ātmārāmāś ca munayaś ca" kṛṣṇere bhajaya

synonyms: tabe—then; ye—that; ca-kāra—syllable ca; sei—that; samuccaya—aggregation; kaya—is said; ātmārāmāḥ ca—all those who enjoy in the self; munayaḥ ca—all saintly persons; kṛṣṇere bhajaya—worship Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "By the aggregate use of the word ca, it is indicated that all the ātmārāmas and saints serve and worship Kṛṣṇa.
